global.title: Rule Knowledge extension
global.description: The Rule Knowledge extension offers a graphical rule editor for creating logical rules. They allow to state complex interrelations (e.g. between certain property values) and can be exploited for inferring knowledge not given as such in SMW+.
global.notice: The Semantic rules extension requires the installation of the Triplestore connector (TSC). Please check http://smwforum.ontoprise.com/smwforum/index.php/Help:Rule_Knowledge_extension for help. Be aware that this bundle has been renamed from 'semanticrules' to 'ruleknowledge'.
